Action.Title: Go for a walk in nature
Action.Description: Go outside in nature or in a park. Sunlight helps raise your energy levels. You can also try meditation.

Rules: 'Diseases' not in query or 'Osteoporosis' not in query['Diseases']
'QueryHour' not in query or (5 < query['QueryHour'] and query['QueryHour'] < 22)

Action.Title: Meditation
Action.Description: Take a moment to focus on what's around you. Try to empty your mind, be present in the moment, and percieve the world around you.

Action.Title: Sleep more
Action.Description: The recommended amount of sleep for the average person is 7-8 hours. Sleep is important for having a healthy body. Not only does it allow the body to recuperate, but it also enhances mental ability and improves mood.
